General.Name: Acconeer AB
General.Description: Acconeer AB (publ) develops radar sensing solutions worldwide. It offers A121 radar sensor that detects distance, speed, motion, and objects up to 20 meters away; A111 Radar Sensor, a short-range sensor device; XM123 entry module that is designed for the use cases people, presence, and motion detection only; XM124 entry module a coherent radar with integrated baseband, and front-end and antenna; XM122 IOT module; XM112 high performance module; and XM132 entry module. It also offers XE121 evaluation kit that includes hardware and software to start developing with the A121 Radar Sensor; and X112 evaluation kit to interface a standard Raspberry Pi 2/3 where the A1 radar sensor software can be installed to enable rapid prototyping. Acconeer AB (publ) has a collaboration agreement with Alps Alpine to provide the automotive industry with radar sensors for a range of use cases. Its products are used in used in robot, consumer electronics, IoT, industrial and agriculture, healthcare and fitness, and automotive applications. The company was incorporated in 2011 and is headquartered in Malmö, Sweden.
